content.text:
The DROP DEFAULT command is used to delete 
a DEFAULT constraint.
To drop a DEFAULT constraint, use the following SQL:

ALTER TABLE Persons
ALTER COLUMN City DROP DEFAULT;

ALTER TABLE Persons
ALTER City DROP DEFAULT;
